articles.title: Borsa günü rekor seviyeden tamamladı
articles.title_tr: Borsa günü rekor seviyeden tamamladı
articles.summary: Borsa İstanbul'da BIST 100 endeksi, günü yüzde 1,1 değer kazanarak 12.992,71 puanla rekor seviyeden tamamladı. BIST 100 endeksi, önceki kapanışa göre 141,22 puan artarken, toplam işlem hacmi 181,6 milyar lira oldu.

articles.title: This one gene may explain most Alzheimer’s cases
articles.title_tr: This one gene may explain most Alzheimer’s cases
articles.summary: Alzheimer’s may be driven far more by genetics than previously thought, with one gene playing an outsized role. Researchers found that up to nine in ten cases could be linked to the APOE gene — even including a common version once considered neutral. The discovery reshapes how scientists think about risk and prevention. It also highlights a major opportunity for new treatments aimed at a single biological pathway.
articles.summary_tr: Alzheimer’s may be driven far more by genetics than previously thought, with one gene playing an outsized role. Researchers found that up to nine in ten cases could be linked to the APOE gene — even including a common version once considered neutral. The discovery reshapes how scientists think about risk and prevention. It also highlights a major opportunity for new treatments aimed at a single biological pathway.
articles.long_summary: Alzheimer’s may be driven far more by genetics than previously thought, with one gene playing an outsized role. Researchers found that up to nine in ten cases could be linked to the APOE gene — even including a common version once considered neutral. The discovery reshapes how scientists think about risk and prevention. It also highlights a major opportunity for new treatments aimed at a single biological pathway.
articles.long_summary_tr: Alzheimer’s may be driven far more by genetics than previously thought, with one gene playing an outsized role. Researchers found that up to nine in ten cases could be linked to the APOE gene — even including a common version once considered neutral. The discovery reshapes how scientists think about risk and prevention. It also highlights a major opportunity for new treatments aimed at a single biological pathway.

articles.title: The bottled water everyone trusts may be the riskiest
articles.title_tr: The bottled water everyone trusts may be the riskiest
articles.summary: In Guatemala’s Western Highlands, researchers found that the drinking water people trust most may actually be the riskiest. Bottled water from refillable jugs—seen as the safest choice—was frequently contaminated with harmful bacteria, while protected municipal wells were the cleanest.
articles.summary_tr: In Guatemala’s Western Highlands, researchers found that the drinking water people trust most may actually be the riskiest. Bottled water from refillable jugs—seen as the safest choice—was frequently contaminated with harmful bacteria, while protected municipal wells were the cleanest.
